author: Al Jazeera
title: Latin American countries take different measures to contain virus
description: In Latin America, countries have been ramping up their containment measures, some more drastically than others.
content:
Strict containment measures such as night-time curfews are in force across several Latin American countries, but other nations are taking a less drastic approach in their fight against the coronavirus.
